Package omp2gpu.analysis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnalysisTools
    AnalysisTools provides tools that perform various analyses for OpenMP-to-CUDA translation.
    AnalysisTools.REGIONMAP
    Class REGIONMAP represents map from variables to their region.
    CudaMallocAnalysis
    Intra-procedural analysis to optimize cudaMalloc and cudaFree.
    CudaParser
    CUDA Annotation parser
    IpG2CMemTrAnalysis
    Inter-procedural analysis to compute OpenMP shared variables that need to be transfered from GPU to CPU.
    IpResidentGVariableAnalysis
    Inter-procedural, forward data-flow analysis to compute OpenMP shared variables residing in the GPU global memory.
    LiveAnalysis
    LiveAnalysis performs live-out analysis of the program at ArraySection level (it handles both scalar and array-with-Section, i.e.
    LiveAnalysis0
    Simplified version of LiveAnalysis.
    LocalityAnalysis
    Locality Analysis (outdated).
    MemTrAnalysis
    Intra-procedural analysis to eliminate unnecessary memory transfers between CPU and GPU.
    OCFGraph
    OCFGraph creates statement-level control flow graphs with optimization on for-loops; if compiler can know that a for-loop is not a zero-trip loop, the edge from condition to exit node is removed, and an edge from the body of the loop to exit node is added for more accurate array section analysis.
    OmpAnalysis
    This pass analyzes openmp pragmas and converts them into Cetus Annotations, the same form as what parallelization passes generate.
    ReachAnalysis
    ReachingDef performs may & must reaching-definition analysis of the program
    ReachAnalysis0
    Simplified version of ReachAnalysis.
    UEPrivateAnalysis
    UEPrivateAnalysis detects possible Upwardly-Exposed-Private variables.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CudaParser.cuda_clause  
    CudaParser.cuda_pragma  
    CudaParser.cuda_tuningconf
